SEARCH
Package ca.openosp.openo.rx.erx.model

Class ERxDoctorPreferences

java.lang.Object
ca.openosp.openo.rx.erx.model.ERxDoctorPreferences
public class ERxDoctorPreferences extends Object
Provides an abstract way to reference the the External Prescriber preferences specific to a single providers (doctor).

FUTURE: org.oscarehr.rx.erx should, in the future, support more than one external prescription service, which may not necessarily need the same doctor preference objects as the External Prescriber. When this support is added, this class should be renamed to org.oscarehr.rx.erx.model.DoctorPreferences; which should implement a new interface named org.oscarehr.rx.erx.model.ERxDoctorPreferences. This new interface should define getters/setters for an authentication structure (in this case, containing username, password, and clientNumber), and a service URL (and org.oscarehr.rx.erx.model.DoctorPreferences should be re-factored as such.

  • Constructor Details

    • ERxDoctorPreferences

      protected ERxDoctorPreferences()
      Create an instance of an ERxDoctorPreferences object.

    • ERxDoctorPreferences

      public ERxDoctorPreferences(String providerId, URL connectionURL, String username, String password, String clientNumber, boolean isInTrainingMode)
      Create an instance of an ERxDoctorPreferences object.
      Parameters:
      providerId - A unique doctor number, provided by the External Prescriber.
      connectionURL - The URL of the www service to connect to.
      username - The doctor's username, which will be used to connect to the www service.
      password - The doctor's password, which will be used to connect to the www service.
      clientNumber - The unique clinic number that the doctor is associated with, provided by the External Prescriber.
      isInTrainingMode - Whether or not the doctor has turned on training mode.
